name: Petit
additionalNotes:
This cigar is totally hand-made, by excellent artisans, with international premium quality. It uses the finest long filler tobaccos, grown in the Placencia's farm, in Esteli, Nicaragua, blended with the best of Costa Rican tobaccos, Cuban seed, as the wrapper Habano 2000, from San Isidro del General in Costa Rica. 

FILLERS: NIC/CR
